resources.string: password should be more than 6 characters
enable location permissions to view weather data
This demo shows the different states on a card.

Cards represent entry points into deeper levels of detail or navigation, such as an album in Music or an upcoming vacation in Trips. They can be used in a grid, carousel, or feed to contain groups of individual packaged information.
Cards on mobile default to 8dp margins. layout_margin needs to be set directly on a View in its layout and will not work when included as part of a style.
This is a filled style card.
This is an elevated style card.
Cards use outlined styling with no elevation and with 8dp rounded corners.
CardView from the Support Library works side-by-side with MaterialCardView. These cards default to Material 1 styles and support fewer style attributes than MaterialCardView.

MaterialCardView uses the correct styles by default and makes use of additional style attributes that are not provided in CardView. If you do not need to use the new style attributes, you can use MaterialCardView in your layout, or apply a style tag to a CardView. We recommend using the MaterialCardView class for the latest Material designs and maximum flexibility in your UI.

string.name: cat_card_action_move_top_left
string.description: A description of an action that a user of an accessibility service can perform to move the card to the top left corner of the screen. [CHAR LIMIT=25]

string.name: cat_card_action_move_up
string.description: A description of an action that a user of an accessibility service can perform to swap the card with the one above it. [CHAR LIMIT=25]

string.name: cat_card_action_move_down
string.description: A description of an action that a user of an accessibility service can perform to swap the card with the one below it. [CHAR LIMIT=25]

string.name: cat_card_action_move_top_right
string.description: A description of an action that a user of an accessibility service can perform to move the card to the top right corner of the screen. [CHAR LIMIT=25]

string.name: cat_card_action_move_bottom_left
string.description: A description of an action that a user of an accessibility service can perform to move the card to the bottom left corner of the screen. [CHAR LIMIT=25]

string.name: cat_card_action_move_bottom_right
string.description: A description of an action that a user of an accessibility service can perform to move the card to the bottom right corner of the screen. [CHAR LIMIT=25]

string.name: cat_card_action_move_center
string.description: A description of an action that a user of an accessibility service can perform to move the card to the center of the screen. [CHAR LIMIT=25]

string.name: cat_card_action_select
string.description: A description of an action that a user of an accessibility service can perform to select the card. [CHAR LIMIT=25]

string.name: cat_card_action_deselect
string.description: A description of an action that a user of an accessibility service can perform to deselect the card. [CHAR LIMIT=25]

string.name: cat_card_dismissed
string.description: a transient text that appears on screen when a card is dismissed [CHAR LIMIT=30]

string.name: cat_card_undo
string.description: A label in a button to dismiss the last action [CHAR LIMIT=15]

string.name: cat_card_swipe_to_dismiss
string.description: A label in a button to dismiss the last action [CHAR LIMIT=30]

resources.string: Swipe this card to dismiss it

string.name: cat_card_swipe_dismiss
string.description: the title of a screen where you can swipe to dismiss a card [CHAR LIMIT=20]
